text:
Does anyone have experience or examples in implementing a multi-language version of the various email preferences system pages? (Email Subscription Preferences/Subscription Confirmation/etc.)

Solutions for other system pages largely assume that you’ll have some level of control over the URL of the link that leads to the system page — however, that solution doesn’t work when we’re required to use the `{{ unsubscribe_link }}` tag to generate the link to the system page.

Has anyone found a good solution for making sure that users land on a preferences page that’s in the same language as the email that sent them there?
